intro.title: Introduction
intro.body: These Terms govern your use of the Infath Auctions platform.

use.title: Acceptable Use
use.body: You agree not to misuse the platform, interfere with other users, or violate applicable laws.

account.title: Accounts
account.body: You are responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of your account credentials and activities.

liability.title: Liability
liability.body: The platform is provided "as is" without warranties; to the extent permitted by law, we limit liability.

contact.title: Contact
contact.body: For questions regarding these Terms, please contact support.

intro.title: Overview
intro.body: This Policy explains how we collect, use, and protect your personal data.

data.title: Data We Collect
data.body: We may collect identifiers, contact details, usage data, and device information.

cookies.title: Cookies
cookies.body: We use cookies to improve functionality and analytics; you can manage preferences in your browser.

rights.title: Your Rights
rights.body: Subject to law, you may request access, correction, deletion, or restriction of your data.

contact.title: Contact
contact.body: To exercise rights or ask questions, please reach out to our support team.

registerAgent.subtitle: You can log in using username and password or via national access

unauthorized.title: Unauthorized
unauthorized.message: You do not have permission to view this page. You may need to log in or use an account with higher privileges.

forbidden.title: Forbidden
forbidden.message: Access to the requested resource was denied. Please verify permissions or contact support.

notFound.title: Not Found
notFound.message: The page you are looking for doesn't exist or may have been moved.

unifiedPlatform.title: Unified and Reliable Platform
unifiedPlatform.description: A central digital platform for asset liquidation and public auction management under official supervision.

transparency.title: Complete Transparency in Auctions
transparency.description: Clear display of all auction details, prices, and schedules to ensure fair participation.

financing.title: Accredited Financing Intermediary
financing.description: Providing financing solutions through accredited financial entities to facilitate auction participation.

securePayment.title: Safe and Reliable Payment Options
securePayment.description: Providing approved electronic payment methods that ensure protection of financial transactions and ease of payment.

cta.title: Start with Infath Auctions Platform Today
cta.description: Log in securely via National Unified Access and start participating in auctions immediately.

appDownload.title: Infath App for Integrated Digital Services
appDownload.description: A comprehensive digital platform that enables you to follow auctions, assets, cases, and beneficiary services, with smart support and a safe, easy-to-use experience.

actions.invalidBidAmount: Bid Amount must be more than highest bid amount

watchlist.title: My Watchlist
watchlist.empty: Your watchlist is empty. Add auctions to track them here.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Brief answers to the most common questions about the Infath Auctions platform and its services.

whatIsPlatform.question: What is the Infath Auctions platform?
whatIsPlatform.answer: Infath Auctions is a unified digital platform for managing public auctions and asset liquidation under official government supervision.

howToParticipate.question: How can I participate in auctions?
howToParticipate.answer: To participate, you need to register on the platform, verify your identity, deposit the required amount, and then you can start bidding on available auctions.

paymentProcess.question: How are payments processed on the Infath platform?
paymentProcess.answer: Payments are processed through secure and approved electronic payment methods that ensure the protection of financial transactions.

allElectronic.question: Are all auctions electronic?
allElectronic.answer: Yes, all auctions on the Infath platform are conducted electronically to ensure transparency and ease of participation from anywhere.

howToContact.question: How can I contact support if I have an inquiry?
howToContact.answer: You can contact our support team through the contact page or by using the live chat feature available on the platform.
